name

public String name
READONLY: Returns the cache name.

Constructor Detail

CWCache

public CWCache()
Method Detail

getBasicCacheStatistics

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object[] getBasicCacheStatistics()
Returns the basic cache statistics

Returns:
Array of values - Cache name, AVM id, Current time stamp, Cache capacity in MB, Cache size in MB, Elements count, Total added element count, Average element length, Total requests,Hit percent, Overflow count, Emergency overflow count, Number of size corrections, Cache refresh schedule

getElement

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Object getElement(String id)
Gets the specified element from the cache. If it does not exist it loads it from the external source. May not be implemented for all caches. If not implemented returns null.

Parameters:
id - Cache element id (string)

getMostRecentElementIds

public String[] getMostRecentElementIds(com.conceptwave.scripting.Integer maxIds)
Deprecated. As of 5.1. Will be removed in 6.0. No substitution provided. The API is not needed after introducing the cache reload functionality

Get the ids if the most recently used cache elements.

Parameters:
maxIds - Maximum number of returned element ids
Returns:
A String array containing the element ids

loadElements

public void loadElements(String[] ids)
Deprecated. As of 5.1. Will be removed in 6.0. No substitution provided. The API is not needed after introducing the cache reload functionality

Loads the specified elements in the cache

Parameters:
ids - String array of cache element ids

registerLoader

public void registerLoader(String searchType,
                           String loaderScriptName)
Registers a loader type for the cache. The loader type is used to find corresponding loader script which usually is registered from a template initialization script. The loader parameters for this script are the the same as for the default cache loader.

Parameters:
searchType - A search type code (user defined string)
loaderScriptName - The fully specified metadata name of the global script name which implements the loader type
